title: Beorcana
content:
is looking great.

 [‹ Running Windows XP on Mac...Freelance Graphics font Q](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202132652/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42760 "Go to previous forum topic") [MS Word - logo format? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202132652/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42787 "Go to next forum topic")
author: frode frank

comments.content: Good morning :^) Where have you been? :^)
Beorcana will be looking great again tomorrow at a type blog near you.
Do you have any idea how cruel it is to dangle Beorcana in the faces of design students with limited font budgets?
;) I might have forgotten to empty my cache in a while, but the switch of featured face was a nice surprise nevertheless. I very much like it.

tomorrow? yay! i can’t wait for tomorrow’s typographica.

p.s. beorcana always looks great.
hmmm, maybe stephen had a different blog in mind, which one could it be, stewf?

Sorry about this similar thread:

[http://typophile.com/node/42775](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202132652/http:/typophile.com/node/42775 "http://typophile.com/node/42775")

ChrisL
